application.doc: Retrieving signer certificate names and details in a certificate database

method.name: GET
method.id: Retrieving signer certificate names and details in a certificate database
method.doc: To complete this operation with the RESTful web service, issue an HTTP GET command on the SSL Certificates signer certificate resource URI.

param.name: Accept:application/json
param.doc: Required for requests to the service

response.doc:
200 ok
[ { "id": "cert_name", "version":"cert_version", "issuer":"cert_issuer", "subject":"cert_subject", "notbefore":"date", "notbefore_epoch":"seconds", "notafter":"date", "notafter_epoch":"seconds", "serial_number":"serial number of the certificate" "keysize":"the key size of the certificate" "sha1_fingerprint":"the SHA1 fingerprint of the certificate" }, { "id": "cert_name2", "version":"cert_version", "issuer":"cert_issuer", "subject":"cert_subject", "notbefore":"date", "notbefore_epoch":"seconds", "notafter":"date", "notafter_epoch":"seconds", "serial_number":"serial number of the certificate" "keysize":"the key size of the certificate" "sha1_fingerprint":"the SHA1 fingerprint of the certificate" }, { .... } ]

param.name: notbefore
param.doc: Start date of the validity of the signer certificate.

param.name: notbefore_epoch
param.doc: The number of seconds since epoch at which the certificate will become valid.

param.name: notafter
param.doc: Expiry date of the validity of the signer certificate.

param.name: notafter_epoch
param.doc: The number of seconds since epoch at which the certificate will become invalid.

param.name: serial_number
param.doc: The serial number of the certificate.

param.name: keysize
param.doc: The key size of the signer certificate.

param.name: sha1_fingerprint
param.doc: The SHA1 fingerprint of the certificate.
